/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The buildings, painted in shades of brown and beige, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun casts its warm glow on the buildings, highlighting their architectural details. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, with shadows adding depth to the scene. The colors are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the brown and beige of the buildings. The image is a testament to the beauty and charm of Beijing's streets.
